title: 有关Java非零退出值和内存不足及反编译MC失败而导致forge环境配置失败请教求助
author: IMENDERDRAGON
txt_content:
MOD的forge环境配置时输入gradlew setupDecompWorkspace之后到反编译MC时出现以下错误，forge的版本是给MC1.11用的，电脑内存是4G的，平常只用到35%左右可是内存降到15%时问题依旧，把配置文件gradle.properties的org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx3G改为多少也没用

错误信息：
:decompileMc
Error occurred during initialization of VM
Could not reserve enough space for 3145728KB object heap
:decompileMc FAILED

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':decompileMc'.
> Process 'command 'D:\Java\jdk\bin\java.exe'' finished with non-zero exit value
 1

* Try:
Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace. Run with --info or --debug
option to get more log output.

BUILD FAILED

错误图片：










错误.JPG
(63.52 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2017-5-21 21:24 上传

replies.author: aiwdsj
replies.txt_content:
Could not reserve enough space for 3145728KB object heap复制代码
没法给jvm分配3G内存。你电脑32位的话还是不要搞1.11的mod了。

replies.author: IMENDERDRAGON
replies.txt_content:
aiwdsj 发表于 2017-5-21 22:15
没法给jvm分配3G内存。你电脑32位的话还是不要搞1.11的mod了。
那么把内存扩大一下行不行？

replies.author: IMENDERDRAGON
replies.txt_content:
aiwdsj 发表于 2017-5-21 22:15
没法给jvm分配3G内存。你电脑32位的话还是不要搞1.11的mod了。
那么把内存扩大一下行不行？

replies.author: 天朝荡寇
replies.txt_content: 32位系统最多访问到4g，你插到8g也没用

replies.author: dogeop
replies.txt_content:
重新安装64位系统
加大虚拟内存
